resources.string: To change the color of your image select the drop down menu that has the names of the colors and select the color of your choice
To change the width of your brush stroke when drawing an image select the drop down menu that indicates the current size of the brush stroke. From there select the width of your choice
To start drawing an image simply touch the canvas in the middle of the screen between the two boundaries and start drawing

The Upload Button can be used to access photos from the gallery app. Pressing the button will take you to the set of photos in the gallery and you are then able to select a photo to set as your image in the canvas instead of drawing an image
The Load Button can be used to look at all previously saved images. From there the user can select an image to reuse as needed
